entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is sitting on a swing and thinking about Sirius and Voldemort.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: A person who is telling Harry to sit tight and be good, implying that he has some authority over Harry.

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who has returned.

entities.name: Daily Prophet
entities.description: A newspaper that Harry is tempted to write to and point out Voldemort's return.

entities.name: park railings
entities.description: The boundaries of the park where Harry is sitting.

entities.name: road beyond the park railings
entities.description: A location outside the park where traffic can be heard.

relationships.description: Sirius has authority over Harry, as evidenced by Sirius telling him to sit tight and be good.
Harry is concerned about Voldemort's return, as evidenced by his thoughts about writing to the Daily Prophet.
